name: $consent
desc: A request that care of a particular type be provided to a patient.  Could involve the transfer of care, a consult, etc.

name: $referral
desc: An undesired reaction caused by exposure to some agent (e.g. a medication, immunization, food, or environmental agent).

name: $advevent
desc: A request that a time be scheduled for a type of service for a specified patient, potentially subject to other constraints

name: $aptmtreq
desc: The transition of a patient or set of material from one location to another

name: $transfer
desc: The specification of a set of food and/or other nutritional material to be delivered to a patient.

name: $diet
desc: An occurrence of a non-care-related event in the healthcare domain, such as approvals, reviews, etc.

name: $adminact
desc: Record of a situation where a subject was exposed to a substance.  Usually of interest to public health.

name: $exposure
desc: A formalized inquiry into the circumstances surrounding a particular unplanned event or potential event for the purposes of identifying possible causes and contributing factors for the event

name: $investigation
desc: A financial instrument used to track costs, charges or other amounts.

name: $account
desc: A request for payment for goods and/or services.  Includes the idea of a healthcare insurance claim.

name: $invoice
desc: The determination of what will be paid against a particular invoice based on coverage, plan rules, etc.

name: $adjudicat
desc: A request for a pre-determination of the cost that would be paid under an insurance plan for a hypothetical claim for goods or services

name: $predetreq
desc: An adjudication of what would be paid under an insurance plan for a hypothetical claim for goods or services

name: $predetermine
desc: An investigation to determine information about a particular therapy or product

name: $study
desc: A set of (possibly conditional) steps to be taken to achieve some aim.  Includes study protocols, treatment protocols, emergency protocols, etc.
